panels.description: Number of CPU cores  in the cluster
panels.title: Installed CPUs

panels.description: Number of free and used by a specific namespace CPUs as a fraction of total available

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"} * on(container, pod, namespace) group_right kube_pod_container_status_running) - sum(namespace_cpu_usage)

sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu",node !~ "admiralty.*"}) - sum(sum by(container, pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"})  * on(container, pod, namespace) group_right kube_pod_container_status_running)

panels.title: CPU usage by namespace

panels.description: CPU usage  by a namespace as a per-second rate of CPU requests (as measured over the last 5 minutes)
panels.title: CPU usage by namespace

panels.description: Number of CPUs currently assigned to the pods

targets.expr: sum(sum by(container, pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"})  * on(container, pod, namespace) group_right kube_pod_container_status_running)

panels.description: Total  TB of available memory in the cluster
panels.title: Installed Memory (TB)

panels.description: Free memory  and  memory used by a specific namespace as a fraction  (and %) of total available.

targets.expr: (sum (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"} * on(container, pod, namespace) group_right kube_pod_container_status_running) - sum(namespace_memory_usage))  / 1024^3

panels.title: Memory usage (GB)  by namespace

panels.description: Memory  (GB) used  by  a specific namespaces
panels.title: Memory usage  (GB) by namespace

panels.description: Memory (TB) currently used  by the namespaces

targets.expr: sum (sum by(container, pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"}) * on(container, pod, namespace) group_right kube_pod_container_status_running) / 1024^4

panels.title: Allocated memory (TB)
